data: Y.... yOu're... laTe......{break}thE WinDs...... bleW yOu herE...{break}buT it'S AlmOst... tOO LAte......{break}Oh, hello! I'm the Magic Man.{break}They used to call me Waldo, heh! But not now, not now.{break}...{break}I live in a chicken house.

It's... weird to be back here after so long.{break}I always really liked the beach.{break}There's something calming about the waves, and the water cascading off the edge...{break}{mood:laugh}I used to come out here and dream about saving the world.{break}Not that I'm taking credit... You did all the hard work.
You want to go on a date... with... with me?{break}...I would love to!
yOu cAme bACK...{random}hEll...o... aGain{random}I fOUNd... yOU...{random}Hello, strange one!{random}Come on in, chum-bo!
bE CAREFul oUT TheRE{random}unTIL nexT TIme{random}tHE CArds... ThE caRdS...{random}Be careful out there... heh...{random}Good......bye....{random}Farewell, yes!
Do you mind if... we go somewhere else?
I could have used a lot more help, actually.

{mood:happy}Thank you. That means a lot.{break}{mood:default}What happened to me... was because I tried to do something I was not trained for.{break}And, I have to admit... perhaps there was a little bit of hubris, too.{break}{mood:sad}I still feel as though I am sifting through the remains of everything that happened.{break}And some of those remains are sharp and painful.{break}I hope you can be patient with me.{break}{mood:like}I need to get back now. Fishbo Junior needs feeding.{break}Thank you... for taking a chance on me.

{mood:like}Well, I tried, at least.{break}{mood:default}The miasma that came over me was so overpowering some days.{break}It was like living in a fog. I could barely remember my own name sometimes.{break}I'm still getting used to how it feels to have the fog lifted...{break}It's quite over-stimulating, to be honest.{break}So, um... I hope you don't mind, but I think I need to rest, now.
thIS... remINDs me oF HoME... I lovE iT... bUt iT maKes mE sO saD...

{mood:sad}Yeah... I'm sorry.{break}I wasn't really myself. It was hard to do anything, in truth.{break}Sometimes it was difficult to even wake up in the morning, the fugue was so strong...{break}...{break}{break}{npc:down}I... I'm sorry. It's still a lot to adjust to.{break}I might have broken free from the miasma, but I'm still not fully myself yet.{break}I need to rest. Perhaps we can do this again?
sparkLE, gLItter, all thinGS SHiny! I LikE tHem!

{npc:down}...The thing I'm most grateful for today is the stars.{break}I haven't looked at the stars in a long time.{break}When my mind was fractured, it often felt like I had blinders on.{break}Like I could only see what was in front of me.{break}So many things have passed me by while I was gone...{break}{mood:sad}What else have I missed?
dOn't giVE me... yOUr trASH... noT nICe.
nO... remINDs me of... dARk timEs... no thANK you.
Oh my god, just enjoy it.
You're right.{break}The waves, the stars, the wind... it's all good for me.{break}Feels like home.{break}Let's watch the waves together.
Oh, this reminds me of home! Thank you!
You're right.{break}It's over... and you saved me.{break}I won't let anything else pass me by!{break}Like this beautiful night... and you, my dear.{break}Let's watch the waves together.
Oooh! I really like sparkly things.
Sorry.{break}I'm trying.{break}Let's just watch the waves.
See you later, my moonstone.{random}I love you.
Hey... don't just give me the trash from your pockets.{break}If you need to get rid of stuff, throw it away.
Come to bed soon, my sweet.

I can't help but notice that I'm the only one with a house that has legs.{break}I don't get it!{break}It's so convenient. I can just go anywhere I like.{break}Some days I live by the sea, some days by the mountain. It's great!{break}What kind of legs would you want on your house?
This... reminds me of before... when I lost my memory.{break}Sorry, but no thank you.
I'd have a matching chicken house!
You... you weren't there for our date.

Yes! Matching chicken houses!{break}We could race them.{break}I wonder if they'd be able to have a baby chicken house?{break}I don't think I'd want to be inside either house when that was, uh, happening.{break}I hope one day I can remember how I made this chicken house.{break}I'll make you one, and we can roam the islands together!{break}{npc:up}My house is actually parked just up there.{break}{npc:left}Would you like to walk me home? I need to check on Fishbo Junior.

Ooooh, double the legs.{break}And you can go much faster than a chicken house!{break}Wait, would all four legs be on the bottom...{break}Or would it be like a centaur, where the house grows where the horse head would be?{break}Many questions to answer about horse house.{break}I wish I could remember how I made the chicken house.{break}I would love to make you a horse house.{break}{npc:up}Anyway, my house is parked just up there...{break}{npc:left}I should go check on Fishbo Junior.{break}Would you like to walk with me?
I... should have known...{break}I would like to try again all the same.
See you in the later!{random}I tip my hat to thee!{random}Off you pop!

I disagree!{break}It's really useful to have a house that can walk around.{break}Not to mention that it keeps things fresh.{break}It even laid an egg once, which was a surprise.{break}It wasn't fertilised, of course. There are no rooster houses nearby.{break}But it made a great omelette.{break}I guess it was a homelette. Get it? Because it was a... house egg?{break}Ha, never mind.{break}I'm gonna walk home.{break}If only I could remember how to make home walk to me...
It's my birthday.{break}Traditionally on Moonstone Island, we give gifts to the birthday-haver!{break}And that's me!!!

...I'm afraid.{break}...{break}{mood:sad}I'm afraid that everything I did... everything WE did... was for nothing.{break}We fixed the rift, but it's just one small part of all the terrible, awful things that are happening everywhere.{break}What if I broke myself for nothing? For a tiny drop in the ocean?{break}It's like trying to hold back the tide...
This is a wonderful birthday gift!{break}Thanks be!
You're not alone. We can do it together.
Better to do something than do nothing.
// Confirmation dialogue when you give an NPC a moonstone baracelet

Together?{break}{mood:like}Yes. I'm not alone.{break}{mood:default}One person can't hold back the tide, but many people can slow it down.{break}It's going to take a lot of work, but maybe, together... we can teach people what to do.{break}It's not easy. And... I'm still scared.{break}{mood:sad}What I did, just for this one rift, I wouldn't wish on anyone.{break}{mood:like}But together, we can make sure that no one else will have to go through that.{break}Thank you.{break}{mood:default}I need to rest, now. Emotions... take it out of me.{break}{mood:like}But I'm just glad I get to feel again.
Are you asking me to... be...
uNITe... thE sELf-sHaRDs... mY LosT bELonGing...

Yeah, you're right.{break}I'd feel worse if I hadn't tried at all!{break}And I'm sorry for being so emotional all the time.{break}It feels like I'm experiencing all the emotion I couldn't have while I was trapped in the mirror...{break}It's hard to handle.{break}But you're right. I did what I could.{break}I'm just glad I get to feel again.{break}I think I need to rest now. Emotions take a lot out of me, still.
You take good care of those Spirits, yes...{break}Don't let 'em get you in your sleep, heh. Yes. Yes.

What?{break}Oh...you mean, thinking that I have to fix everything?{break}...I don't think I'm the "main character", I just... feel helpless.{break}I can only control my own actions, and I want to fix things.{break}Never mind.{break}I think I'm just going to go home.
Buy my cards!{break}They're made of gen-u-ine aetheric winds. I mean, paper?{break}MAGICAL paper! Made of magical trees.
After everything I've been through...{break}You cannot possibly understand how happy this makes me.{break}I accept!
Hmmmm. Cards... with legs?{break}Ho ho ho, Waldo, you're a genius!
Have you tried my trail mix?{break}It's mini marshmallows and nuts and gravel, yeeees.

I hope no one minds that I'm here.{break}...It's been a long time since I've tried Ossono's beer.{break}*sip*{break}{npc:down}Oh, wow. That's... STRONG.{break}{npc:left}So, um... I wanted to thank you...{break}I never thought someone would turn up to help us seal the rift.{break}I mean, that's why I took matters into my own hands... And you know how that turned out.{break}I know you didn't know all of that when you arrived!{break}You probably just thought it was a regular Alchemist job, huh?
Bloop. Bleeeuuup. Blup.{break}I am trying to learn to speak with Fishbo Junior here.{break}Bleeeuuuurp.
This is exactly why I wanted to be an Alchemist.
// If heart level is too low, NPC will decline the bracelet
How did you get in here?!{break}Ah... the door. Yes. Forgot I put that in.
No such thing as a regular Alchemist job!
I just... don't know if I'm ready yet...{break}I still feel so broken. And you deserve someone whole...
Yeah, you really made my job harder for me.
Oh, yes! Buy my cards!{break}Termsandconditionsapply. Cardsmaynotbeusedasflotationdevice.

Really? That's good to hear!{break}I researched alchemy a lot to prepare myself for what I had to do...{break}One of the things I learned was that alchemy is all about helping PEOPLE through helping nature.{break}And that's what you do. You help people. People like me.{break}It's inspiring! But I have to be honest...{break}That beer totally went to my head. Mind if we call it a night?
rEmEMBer... oLD facES... iN thE daRK...{break}tHEY aRE ToO mANy... theY briNG RegReTs

Ha, maybe not!{break}You can never really predict what's going to happen.{break}I certainly never expected to have to turn my memories into a mirror, you know?{break}And now I just have this huge mirror in my house that constantly reminds me of that time.{break}Anyway, I hope you have lots of NORMAL Alchemist work, too.{break}But, uh... Do you mind if we call it a night?{break}The beer has really gone to my head...
// Confirmation dialogue when you give an NPC a grass baracelet
I'm not crying, I have glass in my eyes!

Oh... I'm so sorry.{break}I know it was a lot of work for you to undo what I did...{break}But believe me, I never intended to make it harder for you.{break}You did great, though. You really did.{break}You're a strong person. And that's exactly what we needed.{break}That beer has really gone to my head, though... Mind if we call it a night?
This is the Grass Bracelet... do you know what this means?
Heh! Heh! Heh!!!{break}I have to do twenty-three voice warmups every morning to prepare for a day, yes.{break}Try with me! Heh! Heh! Heh!!!!
Yes, I'm breaking up with you.

Tobin gave me Fishbo Junior, you know.{break}It was just before all the mirror stuff went down, just before I left town.{break}He knew I had always wanted a Spirit pet... but Spirits can be unpredictable and dangerous.{break}So, he found me Fishbo Junior!{break}He's great. He's got such a little personality.{break}I do wonder, though... do your Spirits feel more like pets? Or companions?
Oh, sorry, I didn't mean to give you that.
The... the viSIons, no, no...{break}HelP... hELp... don't let it, don't let it spREAd...
How many Moonstones have you found?{break}One time I put a fistful in my mouth, heh...{break}I want to glow like a dentist's nightlight, yes...
They're sort of pets, sort of familiars?
It's what you give someone... to break up with them...{break}It's a Moonstone Island tradition.
faLL thROUGh thE SkY...{break}...tO finD YouRSelf... FixED As BeFORe...{break}hOW cAN it bE...HoW CaN iT BE...

I like that.{break}Sometimes I feel like my chicken house is a kind of friend.{break}But chicken house doesn't really have a personality.{break}I should really get a pet that I can cuddle.{break}Maybe a little Sheemp. I've always thought Sheemp looked very soft.{break}Your Spirits are very lucky to have you.{break}Anyway, I actually have to go feed Fishbo Junior now!{break}I had a great time tonight. Let's do it again!
...{break}...{break}tHe... LuNALiTHs...{break}dO tHEy cALL yoU...{break}WiTH theIR gLOw?

Yeah, that's a good way of describing it.{break}I guess Fishbo Junior is my familiar as well, since I'm a Magic Man.{break}But he doesn't do much to help out. Except look cute.{break}But that's okay.{break}Sometimes I talk to him, too. He's a very good listener.{break}I hope you get to talk to your Spirits, too. I bet they'd appreciate it.{break}Anyway, I actually have to go feed Fishbo Junior now!{break}I had a great time tonight. Let's do it again!
Would you... like to watch the fireworks with me? The loud noises frighten me... but I might not feel so scared if I had you to stay by my side and hold my hand.
I love puttin' legs on stuff.{break}House got legs. Makes house better.{break}Should find some more things to put legs on.

Really?{break}That's sad. They're still animals with feelings, you know.{break}But I guess you're an Alchemist doing a job... so they're just tools to you.{break}Still, that doesn't mean you can't be nice to them.{break}If I had my own Spirit, it would be more like a pet, I think.{break}Anyway, I actually have to go feed Fishbo Junior now!{break}Good night.
I wish I could remember where I put my mind.{break}Mayhaps Fishbo Junior knows.
I'm sorry... I think I'm going to watch them with someone else...
I can see through time.{break}No... no I can't. Never mind.

When the rift started affecting my mind, that's when I knew I had to go.{break}I felt like I couldn't trust myself around people any more. Like I was a danger to them.{break}So I took my house and enchanted it to have chicken legs...{break}And then I just... walked around the islands.{break}I eventually split my mind into the mirror shards to stop it from getting worse.{break}But I barely remember that time...{break}It was like I was walking around in a purple haze. Everything was so overwhelming.{break}But then you came along and saved me! You're my hero.
Thank you, thank you. Your presence is so calming...{break}I appreciate you. More than you can know.
I repeat myself sometimes, yes!{break}I repeat myself sometimes, yes!{break}I sometimes yes myself, repeat!
We all need saving from something.
How are you here?{break}Are we in a simulated un-reality?{break}Where is the fourth wall, I wonder...
Does that make you the damsel in distress?
It wasn't part of my plan...
// When the player gives a spirit to an NPC (the matchmaker quest)
The rift needs to heal.{break}We broke the world once, heh... yes...

That's very poetic.{break}But, I mean, I literally needed saving.{break}Like an old-timey fairytale. Except I'm also the person who trapped myself in the tower!{break}Anyway, I don't want to keep going on about it...{break}But I really appreciate you venturing into the danger when I couldn't.{break}And I'm glad you came out in one piece!{break}If you need saving from something still... Maybe I can be your hero.{break}You've done so much for me, and for Moonstone Island.{break}You deserve someone to take care of you in return.{break}Maybe that can be me!

{npc:left}Fishbo! Meet Fishbo Junior!{break}You're going to be best best best best friends.{break}{npc:down}Oh, thank you, thank you!{break}Please, please take a talismant from my shop. Free! Free of charge, yes!
It's dangerous to go alone.{break}Take this.{break}It's a breath mint! Yes!

I guess so! I'm the princess in the tower!{break}And you're the dashing knight.{break}I've never thought of it that way. But that's cute.{break}I hope that means that this is the "happily ever after" part.{break}I would really love to be able to take a break after all this.{break}Maybe I can turn the chicken house into a chicken castle...{break}I wonder if Paolo would be up for it.{break}Anyway... thank you. For saving this damsel from distress.
{mood:sad}He's not a Fishbo... Fishbo Junior needs a father...
I want to go back to Moonstone Island some day.{break}Yes. Will they know me?

I guess that's true... I'm sorry.{break}I didn't mean to make things harder for you!{break}But at the time... I didn't see that I had much of a choice. Someone had to act.{break}Still, you managed to close the rift and save me... and I appreciate it.{break}Thank you.
If this is all a game, who is the player?{break}I can see you!!!
Oh, thank you, thank you!{break}Take this, take this. My thanks.
My hat is full of secrets!

You know, I'm not sure why I chose a mirror to put my memories into.{break}I guess it made sense at the time? Maybe I was trying to be poetic?{break}A fractured self-image, or something.{break}I could have chosen something else... like, I don't know, an egg or something.{break}Would you have enjoyed collecting egg shards? Maybe not.{break}It would fit with the chicken theme, though.{break}What would your object be if you had to split yourself like that?
My broom. I already broke it...
I have some good cards today, yes, yes!
// Confirmation dialogue when you propose to marry and all conditions are met

Oh, that's perfect, then.{break}And it represents you so well!{break}Maybe you'd find a piece of the handle here, some of the bristles there...{break}Is that what they're called? Bristles? Fibres? Broomlets?{break}Anyway, that would be fun. Well, maybe not fun, because your mind would be trapped in there.{break}But it would be an epic quest, you know?{break}I shouldn't make light of what happened to me, but it helps me feel a sense of control!{break}I'm getting sleepy. Are you getting sleepy? Let's head home.

Oh, I like that...{break}11 different objects, representing different parts of your soul.{break}As long as you don't pick anything silly. Like an animal, or something that could break.{break}I mean, I think I'm the only person that's ever split their memories like this, so I guess I'm the authority on it now!{break}And... I guess a mirror wasn't a great idea either, really. Very fragile.{break}But it all worked out!{break}I'm getting sleepy. Are you getting sleepy?{break}Let's head home.
More than anything. What do you say?
Did I say anything weird to you before? I'm sorry.

Well, that... makes sense, sure.{break}I wasn't serious, though.{break}I know it probably feels like I'm making light of something traumatic, but...{break}I don't know. It's my trauma, and it makes me feel like I have some power over it.{break}Sorry if that's a little much for you, though. Still getting used to things being... normal. Ish.{break}I'm getting a bit sleepy. Mind if we call it a night?
Sorry if I repeat myself.{break}My brain's still a bit scrambled.
I say... I say...{break}Yes. Yes, yes, yes, yes.{break}How could I not want to marry the beautiful soul that saved me?
Make sure to buy new cards if you need them, but a small deck lets you stay in control!

Oh!{break}...{break}I just had a memory... I don't know what triggered it?{break}It feels like it'll slip away if I don't catch it...{break}I... I was in this hot spring...{break}I was here with Zed?{break}And... he told me...{break}No, it's almost gone...{break}I think he told me that I needed to try to close the rift myself.{break}I think that's where it all started...
I used to fish with Tobin in the spring time...
// If too early to marry, NPC will decline the bracelet
I'm...afraid that I'll never be fully okay again.{break}It's terrifying to think that I might be broken forever...
Oh, I... I don't think... I'm ready for that... yet. I am sorry.
Uh... How long have you been standing there?

Okay, so, we were in the water, and we were talking about closing the rift...{break}I... I think I said that I would do it, if he thought that was our only option, and...{break}He said he would help me prepare.{break}He made me armor to take with me, but... I must have lost it when I fell.{break}When I woke up, I was on the ground. I don't know what happened.{break}And it felt like I had ten thousand voices in my head.{break}I tried to find my way back to Moonstone Island to get Zed's help, but I realised that the voices were dangerous.{break}I had to lock them away in the mirror. And I couldn't risk getting Zed and the others into harm's way, so... I stayed away.{break}...That's all I remember for now.{break}Wow. That took an awful lot of energy.{break}I'm drained... do you mind if we call it a night, and do this again another time?
Congrat-u-lations. You did the marry. I always... believed... in the you.{break}Although, my friend, I must say, I was surprised to hear your vows... since you have never spoken before, yes?
I like bumping into you on my journeys, yes.{break}It can be lonely out there, but you're always so friendly.

I... I think so?{break}It must have been the location that unlocked the memory.{break}I wonder how many more I have like this?{break}Just locked away inside me, waiting to come out.{break}I don't know how many are bad. How many I would like to stay forgotten.{break}Sorry, I think... I'm feeling pretty worn down.{break}Losing memories is really hard on the ol' noggin.{break}Can we call it a night, and do this again soon?
I'm so glad I get to appreciate days like this again.

No, no...{break}We'd been talking about our options.{break}We were both researching the rift, and we knew something was wrong.{break}I think we realised we had no choice...{break}But... I don't remember yet.{break}...Sorry. That really took it out of me.{break}I think I need to go home. Thank you for this evening.
Let us depart, my shining light.{break}Let us begin the rest of our blessed lives.
I was just talking to Fishbo Junior about what we can do for dinner.
Hey, who's your favourite Spirit? Mine's Fishbo, obviously.

I had another memory, you know.{break}I was feeding Fishbo Junior, and... I saw a memory... of you.{break}The first time you came into my house, into my shop... you weren't frightened of me.{break}I remember that. I remember how much that meant to me.
Let's stay a bit longer, ok?
Having a good day? I am!
Why would I be frightened of you?

Oh, Alchemist. I never could have dreamed... that someone like you could appear.{break}I thought I was destined to be lost forever... but you saved me. You saved us all. Thank you.{break}Now... let's party!
A good defense is a good... fence? No, that's not it.

You do?{break}Wow, that... means a lot.{break}When I lost my mind, the part of me that still knew what was going on was so afraid.{break}Afraid I'd never be anything but a danger to people.{break}And... that they'd be afraid of me, too.{break}When you looked at me and smiled, it was like the universe saying that it would be okay.{break}Thank you, Alchemist. Thank you.
Pointy fooooood.{break}It's like an obstacle course for your mouth!

Because... because everyone should have been.{break}When I lost my mind, the part of me that still knew what was going on was so afraid.{break}Afraid I'd never be anything but a danger to people.{break}And... that they'd be afraid of me, too.{break}When you looked at me and smiled, it was like the universe saying that it would be okay.{break}Thank you, Alchemist. Thank you.
Pointy fooooood.{break}It's like an obstacle course for your mouth!
...Oh.{break}Well, um... never mind, then.{break}I think... I think I'm going to go home. I'm tired.

Well well well well, *I* knew there was something special about the hot spring.{break}I thought mayhaps it was buried treasure, but an ancient deity is good, also, yes.{break}Oh... yes... perhaps you'd like to stand here with me, for the festival, perhaps?
Come on in.{break}I'm afraid I'm having a bad brain day.

Ossono and I, we basically grew up together.{break}Her father taught me how to make cards, in fact!{break}She's always been so kind to me, and...{break}...Sorry, is it strange to talk about Ossono on a date?
I feel like everyone would benefit from having a chicken house.
Make sure to keep your deck small.

Meteors are made of particles and atoms, and so are we.{break}We are space-dust, briefly in human form. One day we will return to the stars.{break}Do you want to share this moment of ephemeral beauty with me?
Wonderful, wonderful. Let us seize this opportunity!

She is! Since I came back to Moonstone Island, she's been wonderful.{break}It's almost like I never left. And she is so patient with me.{break}But at the end of the day... it's you who helped me through the hard times, and I'll never forget that.{break}I know she would have too, but I didn't let her.{break}But you kept coming back, even when it was scary.{break}Thank you, Alchemist.
I hope my house can be a place of comfort for you.

Thank you. She's my best friend, after all!{break}Since I came back to Moonstone Island, she's been wonderful.{break}It's almost like I never left. And she is so patient with me.{break}But at the end of the day... it's you who helped me through the hard times, and I'll never forget that.{break}I know she would have too, but I didn't let her.{break}But you kept coming back, even when it was scary.{break}Thank you, Alchemist.
I used to eat cards when I got bored. But not any more. Because I sell them to you.{break}...I still lick them sometimes, though.
Being myself again is really... strange.

Oh... sorry.{break}But... I promise nothing is going on between me and Ossono.{break}And never will, either.{break}Her dad used to joke about it, but... no, we're just good friends.{break}Sorry, I'm doing it again.{break}I'll just go home...
Did I ever thank you for what you did for me?{break}I don't remember... so, thank you.
You might have too many cards.{break}I sell removal talismans, sometimes!

You know, when I was a kid, I used to make cards like the ones I sell.{break}They didn't do anything back then! They were just for fun.{break}I forced other kids to play cards with me. They didn't love it, ha.{break}Eventually I learned to craft them with magically-infused paper...{break}But I could never figure out how to tame Spirits, so I just had to save the cards for someone who could.{break}Luckily, that's when you came along.{break}And selling cards to you means that I have a little nest egg, too! Hmm.. What should I buy?
Remember, a good defense is...{break}I forget.
You are the kindest person I've met.
If you see spirits in your house, that is a good thing{break}They are good.

Oh! That's such a nice idea.{break}But I'm pretty sure Tobin would catch me one for free!{break}Still, spending that money on Fishbo Junior, or on my lovely chicken house...{break}Perhaps that's the ticket. I don't need anything, but they depend on me.{break}Thank you for the idea!{break}Let's walk home together.

Ah, but that's not exciting!{break}I suppose you're right, that's the sensible thing to do.{break}And maybe, some day... I'll have something, or someone, I want to spend that money on.{break}Do you want to walk home together? I'm getting chilly.
Spring, spring, spring.{break}Bounce-word season. Daffodils, tulips, little lambs.{break}A new start, the death of the old, yes!

...Point taken.{break}I know, I know, I went through a lot of trauma, but...{break}When it's just you and me, I can imagine a world where that doesn't define me.{break}I'd love if you could treat me like you'd treat anyone else. With kindness.{break}I think I'll head home, now. Good night.
You looked like you needed help! So I'm here!
